metadata.title: Aerial Survey and Scat Collection of Steller Sea Lions in Alaska
metadata.description:
Will be using Aerial Survey on 3 major rookeries as well as 45 major haulouts.  Scat Collection within the same rookeries and haulouts. Collect stress hormones using captive animals at the Vancouver Aquarium and Seaward Sealife Centre.

An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data "Diets and Stress of Steller Sea Lions in Alaska" supported by NPMR

Status: Planned
